definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Loess geomorphology belongs to one of typical landforms.
sentences.chinese: 其中，黃土地貌是典型地貌之一。

sentences.english: Brahmaputra Grand Canyon is the biggest canyon in the world.
sentences.chinese: 黃土高原是世界最大的黃土地貌。
